MetaData.MetaDataItem:
Features
- Adopt Z-Wave protocol to secure the success of wireless two way communication - Higher RF output power (+2.5dBm output power as compared to -2.5dBm 300 series Z-wave module) to enhance the communication range - Easy install - Very low electricity consumption, meet Europe year 2012 energy-related products requirement directive 2009/125/EC no. 1275/2008 - Resistive load 3000W, 1500W for incandescent load or 320W for fluorescent load - Overload protection - Voltage, Current, Power factor, Instant power Wattage and Accumulated power consumption KWh report - Z-Wave V6.02 - Z-Wave Certificated - LVD: EN 61058 - R&TTE : EN 301489, EN 300200,
